bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with dan shi du fa 丹石毒發 , outbreak of cinnabar [et al.] mineral poisoning. Shi liao ben cao 食療本草 Substance Entry bian xu 萹蓄：丹石發，衝眼目腫痛，取根一握， 洗。搗以少水，絞取汁服之 , “For [treating an] outbreak of cinnabar [et al.] mineral [poisoning] rushing against the eyes and causing them to swell and ache, take a handful of the root, wash this, grind it with a little water, wring to obtain a juice and ingest this”.
